Action.author: ratnakar
Action.body: ERRO 98f Error handling message: event message validation failed: client didn't include its TLS cert hash {code} V1.1 NodeJS Integration tests are not using the API *setTlsClientCertAndKey* causes these failures against NodeJS SDK V1.2*.* I added the API *setTlsClientCertAndKey* in all the above tests and observed all the above tests are PASSED. ~harrisob@us.ibm.com Do we want to change the Integration tests of 1.1 ? >
